CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crystal Cove Villas relative to Ironpeak Residences?
SRP.A: Crystal Cove Villas is {above} Ironpeak Residences in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oceanview Condos}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total rental yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crystal Cove Villas}.

VE.Q: What is Oceanview Condos's Rental Yield in 1987?
VE.A: Oceanview Condos's rental yield in 1987 is {9.06} %.

VE.Q: What is Green Valley Homes's Rental Yield in 1983?
VE.A: Green Valley Homes's rental yield in 1983 is {5.14} %.

VE.Q: What is Sunstone Lofts's Rental Yield in 1986?
VE.A: Sunstone Lofts's rental yield in 1986 is {4.89} %.

VE.Q: What are the rental yield of Oceanview Condos, Crystal Cove Villas, and Skyline Towers in 1986?
VE.A: Oceanview Condos's rental yield is {8.33} %, Crystal Cove Villas's rental yield is {3.68} %, Skyline Towers's rental yield is {3.62} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum rental yield is {2.28} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Rental Yield in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum rental yield is {10.43} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas reached approximately {5.87} % in {1981}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Rental Yield level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas's lowest recorded level is approximately {2.28} % in {1990}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Rental Yield?
SC.A: The average total rental yield is {38.91} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Rental Yield go below 37.86 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield fall between 36.97 and 40.86 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Rental Yield exceed 39.97 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, did the total Rental Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1988?
NC.A: The change in total rental yield between 1981 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1988.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1987, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1981 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1984 and 1987 was {lower} than between 1981 and 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Rental Yield in 1988 higher or lower than in 1990?
NC.A: The total rental yield in 1988 was {higher} than in 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1988, was the average total Rental Yield higher or lower than between 1982 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total rental yield between 1982 and 1988 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1984.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oceanview Condos} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Crystal Cove Villas, Skyline Towers, Green Valley Homes, Sunstone Lofts, Willow Creek Estates, Ironpeak Residences, Oceanview Condos}.
